name.japanese: ガレーラカンパニー・アイスバーグの部屋

description: The private room of Iceburg, the mayor of Water 7 and president of Galley-La Company. This room becomes the site of a dramatic confrontation between the Straw Hats and CP9 when the agents' true identities are revealed.

keyEvents.title: Robin Refuses to Return
keyEvents.description: In this room, Robin firmly refuses Luffy's plea to return to the crew, setting the stage for the Enies Lobby arc.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Robin makes her heartbreaking decision to leave the crew to protect them.

keyEvents.title: CP9 Identities Revealed
keyEvents.description: The true identities of Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno as CP9 agents are revealed to the Straw Hats in this room.
keyEvents.significance: The site of one of the most shocking reveals in the Water 7 saga.

keyEvents.title: Lucci Uses Shigan on Paulie
keyEvents.description: Lucci demonstrates his deadly Rokushiki technique on Paulie in this room.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the deadly power of CP9's techniques is first demonstrated.

keyEvents.title: Lucci's Transformation Revealed
keyEvents.description: Lucci begins to transform into his leopard form in this room, revealing his Devil Fruit power.
keyEvents.significance: The site where Lucci's true power is first glimpsed.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats vs CP9 Battle
keyEvents.description: The first direct combat between the Straw Hat Pirates and CP9 agents takes place in this room.
keyEvents.significance: The battlefield where the power gap between the crews is first established.

statusHistory.reason: Iceburg's room remains intact during the confrontation.
